parties: Warnakulasuriya Antony Janaka Fernando    Vs        Hon. Attorney General
keywords: Proof beyond reasonable doubt Evaluation of Child’s Evidence Corroboration in sexual offences Improbability Corroboration when the prosecutrix’s evidence is unsatisfactory Falsus in uno,  falsus in omnibus Exaggeration distinguished from deliberate falsehood Inconsistencies of evidence of material witnesses on material particulars.
